attributes.action: To order GCHQ to reveal all it's data with no exception.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would encourage an open and fair society above all and although may take time to adjust other countries stand points would stop the dangerous game of secrets forver almost.
With no secrets !we could deal with all problems and depend upon no ones better judgement unless they directly talk to us and we agree.
It may sound mad because your used to the secretive world you've been brought up into but i'll bet you some time in our future it will happen so why not now.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
